constituent: roast, in front, horns, butcher, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, sword, sabre, saber, oven-fire, barbecue
heisigStory: Think of roasting the guest of honor at a party - literally, in front of an oven-fire.
koohiiStory1: In many asian restaurants, meat is roasted right in front of you over flames.
koohiiStory2: At the roast, they make the roastee sit in front of everyone else, over the flames to speak, as the comedians roast him a new one!
myStory: nướng. phía trước để củi dưới để nướng
words: 煎る(いる): to parch, to fry, to fire, to broil, to roast, to boil down (in oil)
